name: The tiny strapping of a small heart
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It has excellent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
